ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tarot finds herself with a choice between Life or Death as she journeys through the Tarot Deck come to life. Meanwhile Raven is trying to throw Jon off New Avalon with the help of her new Dragon Witch Sisters.
A comatose Tarot is tested by the spirits and Jon is tormented by witches who hate all humans.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 22:33:23. [CVDB118155]
